title: Russia's standards agency says informed about recall of 4,794 Mercedes cars
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russiaâ€™s standards agency said on Friday it had been informed about the voluntary recall of 4,794 Mercedes-Benz cars produced by German carmaker Daimler ( DAIGn.DE ) and sold from 2014 to 2017.
FILE PHOTO: A view shows the logo of Mercedes-Benz on a car in Moscow, Russia, July 6, 2016. REUTERS/Maxim Zmeyev The regulator said the reason for the recall was a possible problem with the airbag, it said.
Reporting by Maria Kiselyova; Editing by Tom Balmforth
